Text:
Lindoffs,

Before i snatch this one, i like to know whether or not the subtitles are from the original source dvd ?!?

I await your answer....

cheerios
Yes i read you. Yes they are from source dvd.

mkay, thanks 

lindoff, dont get me wrong but woud i ask to much from you to put that kind of info in the discription where it belongs the next time please ?


regards,
